comment:
* Provide an optional convenience implementation of Locator. * *
* This module, both source code and documentation, is in the * Public Domain, and comes with NO WARRANTY. * See http://www.saxproject.org * for further information. *
* *

This class is available mainly for application writers, who * can use it to make a persistent snapshot of a locator at any * point during a document parse:

* * 
 * Locator locator;
 * Locator startloc;
 *
 * public void setLocator (Locator locator)
 * {
 *         // note the locator
 *   this.locator = locator;
 * }
 *
 * public void startDocument ()
 * {
 *         // save the location of the start of the document
 *         // for future use.
 *   Locator startloc = new LocatorImpl(locator);
 * }
 *
* *

Normally, parser writers will not use this class, since it * is more efficient to provide location information only when * requested, rather than constantly updating a Locator object.

* * @since SAX 1.0 * @author David Megginson * @version 2.0.1 (sax2r2) * @see org.xml.sax.Locator Locator

methods.name: public String getPublicId()
methods.comment:
* Return the saved public identifier.
     *
     * @return The public identifier as a string, or null if none
     *         is available.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Locator#getPublicId
     * @see #setPublicId

methods.name: public String getSystemId()
methods.comment:
* Return the saved system identifier.
     *
     * @return The system identifier as a string, or null if none
     *         is available.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Locator#getSystemId
     * @see #setSystemId

methods.name: public int getLineNumber()
methods.comment:
* Return the saved line number (1-based).
     *
     * @return The line number as an integer, or -1 if none is available.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Locator#getLineNumber
     * @see #setLineNumber

methods.name: public int getColumnNumber()
methods.comment:
* Return the saved column number (1-based).
     *
     * @return The column number as an integer, or -1 if none is available.
     * @see org.xml.sax.Locator#getColumnNumber
     * @see #setColumnNumber

methods.name: public void setPublicId(String publicId)
methods.comment:
* Set the public identifier for this locator.
     *
     * @param publicId The new public identifier, or null
     *        if none is available.
     * @see #getPublicId

methods.name: public void setSystemId(String systemId)
methods.comment:
* Set the system identifier for this locator.
     *
     * @param systemId The new system identifier, or null
     *        if none is available.
     * @see #getSystemId

methods.name: public void setLineNumber(int lineNumber)
methods.comment:
* Set the line number for this locator (1-based).
     *
     * @param lineNumber The line number, or -1 if none is available.
     * @see #getLineNumber

methods.name: public void setColumnNumber(int columnNumber)
methods.comment:
* Set the column number for this locator (1-based).
     *
     * @param columnNumber The column number, or -1 if none is available.
     * @see #getColumnNumber
